reviews.review_text: Pet smart gave me crabs lol

It s a good pet shop in comparison to other stores. Most of the products are well organized and you won t have hard time finding what you want. They provide a buzzer to ask for assistance which is quite satisfying, because I always struggle with finding a store associate to help me out. The store associate at Vancouver s west 2nd Ave are so helpful and kind.

Staff is always friendly and helpful. Seems like people that work their really enjoy their jobs. We took our dog here from her training. The trainer, Donna, is great. Very patient and always happy to see us. We take our dog here for a walk sometimes and always find new things to buy. They have pumpkin cookies for Halloween.

I ve been getting my Bernedoodle groomed by Michelle since she was a puppy and Michelle is FANTASTIC. The cut always looks good and she s very patient (my girl hates getting her face trimmed) Highly recommend the groomers, make sure you leave a tip. They re always busy and do a great job. Also very friendly staff.

Exceptionally friendly and accommodating staff, we were half an hour late to a kitten adoption meeting and the volunteer was still happy to meet with us. She even let us play with all the cats and got us an answer for all our questions.

Editing my review as I always come to this location for my dog s grooming and to pick up supplies. The staff here are amazing! Every time we walk by, my dog stands outside looking in with her tail wagging. We also did the intro puppy training course here and it was so cute when they gave out graduation hats on the last day.

Went in today for little fish, shrimp and some water plants. Peggy the store manager is very friendly and knowledgeable. She elaborated the tool we need and the some instructions. Very nice experience shopping there.
Excellent service, my dog is always happy when he goes to PetSmart!
Friendly staff good location with spa and training services. Underground parking available.

Woohoo    Petsmart thank you    for the bird   box   and the bird   hospital    . We haven t made it yet but we put blue    in the small cage separately from the other two birds   for now let him have some space
Had a lovely experience, Rose here helped us check out asked us about our day our experience we shared our adoption story with them/him/her.
Great location, always has what we need. Love the Treats program too!
Fantastic small store but has everything you need. The staff are very friendly and have helped me choose various products for my new pup Winston!
Really big pet store and has all the pet food you may want to have... Many brands..liked the stock.. can go for anything you want, wont be disappointed..
Cindy, the cashier was excellent. She was fast, knowledgeable, and polite. She deserves a bonus!
Always go there. Downside: parking! Othereise, worth every time you go there when you feel bored or need something for the lovely pet!
Great location, awesome customer service from all staff including management. My dog Parker loves going there!

Great location with excellent staff who are attentive, courteous and respectful. The cashier was particularly helpful. They have good prices overall on just about anything. Also, their return policy is fantastic. If youre not satisfied for any reason, a return is hassle-free. Pet Smart parking is located underground entering on the side street.

They have their Betta fish in giant tanks and they are so happy! The best price on guppies and ghost shrimp and aquarium plants. Service here is always fantastic (sometimes slow but whatever, its a giant shop!) and they have a huge variety of everything you could ever need to ensure you have the happiest pets. Excellent selection of dog and cat food, toys and costumes! I really love this store and always get everything for my pets.

The puppy training class at this location is very good, especially with Donna as the trainer.  Location is clean and convenient to get to by walking from yaletown. Perfect distance to get our puppy warm up before class. Toy and treat selection was good, employees were friendly and helpful.

Every time I come, I have nothing but a positive experience! A little bit of a crammed store in my opinion, especially compared the one in Richmond that I visit often. But the staff are super friendly, everything that I look for is in-stock majority of the time, and theres great selection on pet products. Probably my favourite PetSmart!

Pet smart is a  favorite pastime for  my 9 month old puppy. We signed up for training classes the group class wasnt working out for my shy  puppy PetSmart offered an upgrade to attend a private class for a one on one training session.  I highly  recommend a private training  class for puppies.
This place is cool! Staff iz amazing. PetSmart has some great cupons system. You guys should check it
First time grooming my morkie with Yoshiko, loved how pretty and clean she was. I highly recommend this place

Staff here are friendly. Theres alot of variety of food treats etc. However if you have an XS or small dog the clothes are very limited and not the greatest of selections. Otherwise its pretty good store for all your pet needs.
Nice store, friendly staff, large selection of all things pets.

Their training and grooming services were absolutely great. The price is super reasonable. My dog has a serious anxiety problem and when I took him a different grooming salon, I had to give him a calming drug but still hold him down so tight while he was freaking out  however this place was the first place he had his nail cut done by himself. I was so scared of being refused because of his aggression while waiting outside but the trainer went to check how he was doing for me between her lessons(I guess that was on her break). That made me feel safe and comfortable.  Thank you so much for all helps. This is the only grooming place Ill take him.
Good, clean location with knowledgeable staff. Small but compact for pet essentials compared to other locations. Great none the less. I wish they groomed cats but that s okay.
Parking is in the side of the building can b validated with purchase in store. Michelle & Camilla groom my pups beautifully every time.  & the points are great to get

Conveniently local close to cambie bridge. Store is massive with everything you need for whatever pet you may have. They also offer pet training classes on site. I recently found out they have parking downstairs which you will be validated for when paying for goods. They staff are friendly and very knowledgeable. You can also take your pet dog or cat with as it is pet friendly.

This location can feel a little busy because its a smaller store, but if you go later (in the hour or two before closing) theres a good chance youll be the only customer there. Helpful, really nice staff. Free underground parking as long as you show them your parking ticket (they deduct the price of parking from your purchase).
Fun lots of fish and wide variety of tanks and foods for petts mostly cats dogs fish birds and reptiles fish was my main focus of going. Pretty cool. Very competitive prices
Clean facility. Kind and helpful staff. The small pets look healthy as well which is a large indication of a good pet store. Bring your doggies for a treat!

I took my rescue dog here for his first grooming appointment. He was matted with almost ingrown nails. They were nothing except gentle with him even though he tried to bite them. He looks like a different dog. Very thankful for the kind groomers here.

I am writing this review because of the excellent customer service I received while shopping there today.    I normally dont shop here because its not in my neighbourhood,   but saw it while driving by and decided to check it out.    The service employee,   Chris,   went above and beyond to help me find products,    and he found an on sale I needed,   but didnt see.   Chris was very patient,   calm,   knowledgeable,   and is an example of what customers like myself appreciate when  shopping,   especially in a big box store.    I also liked their wide selection of products,    and their prices are not any more expensive than other pet supply stores.    Thank you,   Chris.    I hope the Petsmart management recognize and value your contribution to customer service,    its employees like you who help me  decide to shop there again.    Thank you !

I dont typically write reviews for larger corporations - but this location and its management are absolutely WONDERFUL. Laura, specifically, was so incredibly kind, accommodating, and displayed so much empathy and integrity. This branch is incredibly fortunate to be under such great management.

Highly recommend the dog training classes with Eva! My beagle puppy is like a new dog after the 4 weeks of training. Most importantly, I know how to train him properly going forward. Eva was amazing, Archie will miss her dearly until we return for Advanced Classes in a couple of months!
Great customer service. Easy parking.
Excellent experience every time I shop here. Great prices and access to products we rely on. Staff are knowledgeable and helpful. I feel appreciated and value as a customer when I shop here.
Great selection, friendly staff

Im a new fish owner! In a series of interesting circumstances- I acquired some big fish   and so my tank was having some issues (one fish mysteriously died)... The lady cashier was super helpful, and helped me diagnose the situation just by listening to my explanation. She even double checked the fish medicine I was getting, and gave me some guidance. I really appreciate the genuine and caring service that I received! Thank you so much!

This location is always a pleasant experience, especially when dealing with Peggy, the manager. She recently helped us with a return/exchange which would ve normally been a huge headache but she was a total rockstar about it and was very helpful! We will keep returning to this location because of her. Highly recommended. Kudos to you, Peggy!
Went for grooming services. My dog had a bath here. He seems to have enjoyed himself. The staff are friendly, the prices are relatively affordable.
staff went out of their way to be extra accommodating and helpful for my dog and I. The store always has a ton of variety and pretty good sales!

Always so friendly. Also, I may be mistaken, but I believe PetSmart carries most, if not all, of the Wellness brand of cat and dog foods. My cat has decided its Wellness Select or nothing... Its not cheap, but given that the rest of the prices here are in line/competitive enough with other majors in the industry, I dont blame PetSmart for that. I blame the fabulously wealthy people who clearly whisper in my cats ears about all the things he deserves when Im not looking.

I give the staff, selection & prices 5-stars. The issue below has been addressed  & I have added the star that was held back. XoXo Previous Review: The poor interior lighting coupled with small font sizes on packages (& shelf price labels) unduly increases time spent to check ingredients before buying your pet a new treat. It is fatiguing. If this negative value is addressed I believe it would translate into more sales as customers will be inclined to look at more products. XoXo

Totally amazing. Got my hamster Timby today, I m leaving him be in his enclosure until he is comfortable enough to let me tame him. Jake was amazing, super gentle and very nice. Made sure I knew what I was doing and was prepared before taking him home. Totally recommend.
You can find what ever you want aaaaand the staff in VAN :)
Awesome variety and lovely customer Service
Great and knowledgeable service. Thanks guys!
The sales rep was very helpful and polite. I will definitely be shopping there again for my hedgehog supplies
Always as a good stock variety and availability. Click and collect really quick and easy. Staff are always happy and helpful. My dog loves the free snacks at the register.
I always got treat and hay for my bunnies there
Helpful staff, good selection, and theres always cute dogs wandering in the store. Located in a trendy neighbourhood with good restaurants and coffee around.

Came in a couple weeks ago to get my dog some oral hygiene products and couldnt be more happy. I went to 2 other pet stores before coming here and couldnt find the specific treat my dog actually appeals to. I came here and after searching the entire store I was just about to walk out until I decided to check with the clerk and she walked me over to the exact treats my dog likes and told me they were very new so they had the display up front. Anyways, I couldnt be happier! I bought a small bag of Arcs naturals and now my dogs horrible breath is slowly getting better. She WILL NOT eat any other dental treat, these are the best, I definitely recommend. Thank you.

Bought a reptile tank from here. Upon bringing it home we found a large crack in the side. With how the tank was packaged it would have been impossible for staff (or us) to see it in advance. Gave them a call and they said they had no replacement, but could call us when one came in. Sure enough, 4 days later we received a call. Went in to pick it up and Matt was extremely accomodating, he carried the cage right over to us and made the transaction happen seamlessly. They handled an unavoidable, unfortunate situation with professionalism and compassion, well done!

I go to this store for the selection, 2 huge aisles each of cat and dog food.  Plus lots of fish and bird things too.  The location is just a short block walk from the skytrain.  The prices could make you weep, so all I can say on that note, is that the prices everywhere else seem to be just as bad, if not worse, which is also why I go there.  The toy selections are really good too. Very pet friendly, of course, I always meet a new dog friend or 2 when I go there.  Also, the cashier was very funny when I accidentally handed her the competitions savings card instead of the PetSmart card.  Said it happens all the time.   It took me about 15 minutes to spend $52 on cat food, half wet (cans), half dry.  My girl is a very happy kitty   tonight! She keeps going back to her dish for more kibble,  like every ten minutes.  I may have to ration her severely.   CHEERS everyone, love your furry friends, they so deserve it.
The staff are always professional and knowledgeable. Could have been 4.5 stars because their cat grass quality is quite random.
Good selection , plenty of food and toys , cages ect , prices are reasonable... Will continue to shop here ..
Got ourselves a frog for the BEST BUY at Cambie. But I think it broke after a while and decided to be a Bat

Awesome customer service. Theyre always super attentive. Today I had one of the customer service reps tell me that Orchard Hay was essentially the same as Timothy Hay and theres no difference, but my bunny doesnt like it at all    Apparently she can tell the difference.
Staff is very professional and helpful :)
Everyone is super friendly! We go here weekly with our puppy and he just loves it. We also completed their puppy training class with Victoria (she s awesome) and found it very helpful!

A lady who assisted was so kind and friendly. However, we are keep coming back here for shrimps for our aquarium thinking they will replenish as they say, but they only have one variety left. We just bought them anyway. Accessible by Canada line and busses.
We bring our puppy here for grooming and they re incredible! They do wonderful work and they re all so loving with the dogs. Kayla S was especially great if you can book with her!

I love this PetSmart! The staff are always so friendly and talkative - always willing to offer help and chat about our respective pets (or pet prospects). I love that they change their selection up so often and their return policy is really great as well. Thanks!
Good vibes. Been here a couple times with my hedgehog and friends dogs. They enjoyed their visit each time. Nice and helpful staff as well!

Incredible customer service at this location. I was helped out by Matt the other day. I made a mistake (chicken) with the puppy food I purchased and he gave me a full credit. They were currently out of the food (beef) bag size I was after but he took the time to let me know when it would be restocked. Introduced me to the Merrick rep who happen to be in house and also took the time to interact with my pupper, which only helps with his socialization. Just wanted to say a big Thank you to Matt and his team. They always take good care of us there.

They have the cutest little pet toys! The frog makes frog noises and the two little mice are the most adorable toys i have ever seen. My ferrets instantly approved them by stealing them from coffee table, before i had a chance to remove the packaging.

The online grooming was very easy and the wash and cutting my dog nail was great, I had another service booked and they told me it was not necessary . So it end up cheaper than what I expected. Good job.
The staff is always friendly and helpful. Their inventory is always good, I can always find what I m looking for and their cue side pick-up is great! They also validate your parking!
Good selection of products and helpful people. They were out of what I wanted, but these days you cant always blame a store for that.

I try to buy my dog supply here. Their prices are abit high, but the offer training classes which is really helpful and also they have 100% lively and supportive staffs. I try different branches and everywhere i went they were so helpful and friendly.
Lots of variety of products, reasonable prices, prompt and pIeasant service.  Great place to shop.
I love all the people working here, they re so lovely w put pets

We just adopted a fantastic little guy from Vancouver Cat Therapy & Rescue, the organization partnered with PetSmart. They were fantastic to deal with. The staff at PetSmart knew all about our little guy and were really helpful with getting us set up to get our new addition home and had great offers for new pet parents.

Well stocked, clean pet supply store close to transit services. My interest, plentiful aquarium livestock in clean, healthy tanks -many fish varieties, shrimp, snails and more. Some freshwater plants. Good number of aquarium parts and supplies in stock- pumps, lights, water quality supplies, tanks, decorations and much more!

Best place for pet foods that we found. Service is decent too, with good hours and overall convenience. Delivery option is a good add on, but they used FedEx, which is meant for businesses, and not good for residential addresses so thats something I hope PetSmart fixes. Canada Post would be much better for customers since if we miss delivery, its easy to go pick it up at a post office near by, while FedEx doesnt have that option and you cant tell what time of day they will try to deliver.
Nice clean store lots of things for puppies and kittens. We bought a really nice new bed for our puppy dog and he loves it. The staff are friendly

I used to buy most of my pet products in the U.S. until Pet Smart opened stores in the lower mainland. Selection is good and prices are better than the boutique pet stores. Pet Smart even carries BC brands like True Leaf in their stores. I was disappointed when Pet Smart discontinued their Equisicate corn litter. It was my favorite after trying over 20 different litter brands.

Every time I ve been there I ve received excellent service! Everyone seems to be quite knowledgable on fish which is why I continue to go there when I am unsure or need something for my aquarium. If you bring a sample of your aquarium water they will even test it for you and tell you if it s healthy or what you might need to make it better.
I love this location. The staff is always super friendly and helpful. My dog loves coming here. For the size of the store the selection is decent.

Always friendly, helpful and knowledgeable staff. Great that I can return items if my dog doesnt like them without question. Convenient location. Clean store. Plethora of items to choose from. Prices compatible to other pet stores.

We have been going to see Dana at the grooming salon since Pepe was a baby. He is a medium size Maltese, 3 Years old full of energy. The only problem is that Dana is so amazing that is hard to get an available time in her schedule

Barbara is a cat whisper.  The very best groomer ever!  She takes such good care of our cat and gives the best haircut ever!  Our cat is not the easiest, so we were told from the other groomers but not with Barbara.  When I came into the store to pick her up, Barbara was holding her in arms.  Amazing!  I hear she is leaving to Richmond store.  So not fair.

PetSmart is well-located and has free underground parking. The large selection of products at a competitive price plus a knowledgeable and friendly staff make shopping there a pleasant experience. There especially geared for cats and dogs.

Great grooming!! We took our dog here for an impromptu groom as we are visiting from out of town, though get our dog groomed at our local PetSmart. Shonte was our dogs groomer and she did an AMAZING job. Ears to tail and everything in between, its evident she cares about the work she does as Ive never seen a more even groom. I would highly recommend bringing your pets here for a cleanup!
The woman helping me in the fish department seemed to really know her stuff.
Good selection of dog food and treat. If you are a member, you can also save some money and collect points.
Great grooming service by Michelle! Jasper loves his new haircut and he smelled sooo good. Highly recommend the puppy trim for puppies that are new to grooming.

Great sales on a lot of their doggie products, most importantly the staff made our newly adopted pupper feel much more comfortable coming in. I cant speak to their in house training as we havent tried it but I think we will soon!

We went to this location to get a heat light for our turtle, and found Erika to be very helpful and knowledgeable in the specific needs of our pet. We will definitely come back if we need to shell out for any more supplies in the future!

I was buying dog food since my dog was having digestion problems. I went to buy another food formulated for my yorkie puppy specifically, the associate there read the ingredients of what I chose and educated me on the stuff you dont want in your dog food. So she recommended something else formulated for dietary sensitive puppies and now my puppy is feeling amazing. And because of this we were able then house train our puppy properly now. Complete game changer. Thanks to that female associate (sorry I didnt get your name).
Good pet shop where you can find many options about food, beds, toys, grooming, etc...

Took my pupper for his first-ever grooming session. He s usually anxious with new people and new situations   but I think I was the more anxious one! Michelle was his groomer for the day, and she was so sweet putting my dog (and me) at ease. He had the full package   a haircut, his nails clipped, a bath... all of the above + some extras. When I picked him up, Michelle gave me some tips & tricks on what I can do to make his next appointment easier (i.e. she said he didn t like his chin being touched, so I should train him to make him comfortable with that). That was super helpful! And despite the fact that we re still in Phase 2 of Covid-19, and they re not allowed to have 2+ stylists on a dog (for their physical distancing safety), Michelle still did a really good job with my dog s nails solo. I would definitely recommend this location and Michelle as a stylist to anyone.
Took my very nervous for to have her nails trimmed. The store associates were so great!
The wife has 2 cats 1 has a sensitive stomach pet smart sells blue buffalo sensitive stomach so I went with her to get it here

Theycan  have more pet things than I imagined existed ANYWHERE!! No they dont pay me .. Or anything else.free cat food? Nah they could and I would maybe accept but what could I say thats true and better? If you like animals go in when you are passing a PS store.. Cool..and some of the employees are too ..if yer clerk isnt what you want jus loom about and pick again ..too bad my apt doesnt have room for a ton of cages and habitats .grin c for yourself and let me know if wrong..cheers
Have been taking our dog to get groomed here for many years. She always looks great and enjoys her time with the groomer.
I took my 4 month old for a puppy trim. Yoshiko did a great job, paid attention to details and my pup came out fresh and clean and happy! Thanks again
